name: OCKAnyTaskViewSynchronizerProtocol
desc: A protocol that handles creating and updating type-erased view synchronizers for custom tasks.

items.name: func makeAnyView() -> UIView & OCKTaskDisplayable
items.desc: Creates a view to be synchronized.

items.name: func updateAnyView(UIView & OCKTaskDisplayable, context: OCKSynchronizationContext<OCKTaskEvents?>)
items.desc: Updates a view using a specific context
